name: Minecraft for Gameboy/ps1/tetris console
description:
key 1- ps1 version

key 2- pc version

key 3 - ps4 version

key 4 - gameboy version

key 5 - Tetris console version

-------------------

key 6 - Desactive RTX

key 7 - Active RTX

--------------------

F - inventory

E - Up Block

Q -Down Block

Up Arrow/Down Arrow - Camera control
